mapper.select: select id,name,phone,post,main_addr,genre, (select sum(cash_pay) From (select cash_pay From member m,cash c where m.id=c.cash_id and m.id=#{id} and cash_state=1)) as cash_pay from member where id=#{id}
mapper.insert:
select NVL(max(cash_no)+1,1) as cash_no from cash
INSERT INTO cash VALUES( #{ cash_no}, #{cash_id}, sysdate, #{cash_pay}, 0 )
mapper.update: update cash set cash_state=1 where cash_id=#{cash_id}
